Name: Civil penalties for violations of the littering law.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to civil penalties for violations of the littering law.
BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

History.Description: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

History.Description: This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1. Subdivision two of section 16-118 of the administrative code of the city of New York, is amended by adding a new paragraph twelve to read as follows:
12. Every person employed by the city of new york who is authorized to issue violations pursuant to this section, except police officers, shall be issued and shall have in their possession while on duty a working digital picture camera. Any such person shall take a picture of the condition warranting the issuance of the violation whenever possible and said pictures shall be included as part of the violation file.
Â§2. This local law shall become effective one hundred eighty days after enactment.

CJC-5/16/07
LS-2785
